news_header: Trump orders Gulf of Mexico to be renamed Gulf of America.
news_original_title: Google totteli Trumpia: Meksikonlahti on nyt Amerikanlahti Googlen kartoissa Yhdysvalloissa
news_text: President Donald Trump has ordered the Gulf of Mexico to be renamed the Gulf of America, claiming that the change respects the greatness of America. This new name will appear on American maps, while users in Mexico will still see the old name. The name change is effective from February 9, and Trump has also ordered the renaming of Denali back to McKinley. The changes reflect Trump's administration's stance on honoring American heritage.
